properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A beautifully presented four bedroom detached family home located in a quiet residential cul-de-sac close to Darrick Wood schools and within easy reach of Orpington Station. The property offers a spacious dual-aspect lounge, separate dining room, modern fitted kitchen, ground floor study and utility room. Upstairs you will find four generous bedrooms, including a master with en-suite, and a contemporary family bathroom. Additional features include a large landscaped rear garden, garage, off-street parking and gas central heating.

A bright and modern one bedroom top-floor apartment ideally situated for local shops, restaurants and Petts Wood Station. The property features an open-plan living room with a contemporary fitted kitchen, a spacious double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a stylish bathroom. Additional benefits include gas central heating, double glazing throughout, and allocated parking. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors.

A well-maintained two bedroom first-floor maisonette located within easy reach of both Orpington High Street and local transport links. The property includes a generous lounge, a fitted kitchen, two good-sized bedrooms and a modern bathroom. Benefits include a private rear garden, loft storage, double glazing and gas central heating.

An impressive five bedroom detached family residence set on a prestigious road within close proximity to Bromley South and highly regarded schools. The home offers extensive living space, including three reception rooms, a luxury open-plan kitchen/breakfast area, utility room and ground-floor cloakroom. The first floor comprises five well-proportioned bedrooms, two with en-suites, plus a spacious family bathroom. Features include a large rear garden, double garage and off-street parking for multiple cars.

A spacious two bedroom first-floor flat set within a well-maintained purpose-built block close to bus routes and local amenities. The property features a large lounge/dining area, a fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms and a modern bathroom. Additional advantages include communal gardens, residents’ parking, secure entry system and double glazing.
